name: Warhammer: Wrath of Heroes
summary:
Warhammer Online: Wrath of Heroes was a multiplayer online battle arena being developed by BioWare Mythic and supposed to be published by Electronic Arts for Microsoft Windows until it was canceled. The game was a spin-off based on Warhammer Online: Age of Reckoning and was a Play4Free title, Electronic Arts' free-to-play model. 
The game did not progress beyond beta and was shut down on March 29, 2013 effectively canceling it.
